Data: Otieno to Haddin, no run Haddin charges and flays his bat at a good length ball, trying to hit over the off side. He was beaten and lucky that the ball didn't bowl him
Otieno to Haddin, 1 run full ball on off stump, driven wide of the fielder at mid-off, who is rather deep as well
Otieno to Ponting, no run a short and wide ball but the bounce is lower than usual and Ponting gets beaten as he tries to cut, the ball passed under his bat
Otieno to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot towards cover
Otieno to Ponting, no run Ponting strides forward to a good length ball and opens the face to steer the ball towards point
Otieno to Ponting, FOUR runs shot! Ponting strides forward, using the width of the length ball outside off to free his arms and lash it through point with a fierce square drive
NN Odhiambo to Haddin, no run played off the front foot towards the off side
NN Odhiambo to Haddin, no run the slower ball on off stump, Haddin defends watchfully towards the bowler
NN Odhiambo to Haddin, no run Odhiambo angles a good length ball into Haddin, not giving him the room he craves, and makes him defend on the leg side
NN Odhiambo to Haddin, no run excellent! Haddin backs away towards leg to make room, Odhiambo follows him with a full ball and Haddin gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
NN Odhiambo to Haddin, 1 run Haddin backs away again and steers a length ball towards third man by opening the face of his bat
NN Odhiambo to Ponting, no run Ponting strides forward and punches a length ball powerfully towards point where the fielder tumbles to his right to make the save
Otieno to Haddin, no run Haddin steps down and makes room to hit through the off, he ends up swishing lamely and gets beaten. He's moving a bit too much is Haddin
Otieno to Haddin, no run good length ball angling into the right-hander, Haddin defends on the leg side

Otieno to Haddin, FOUR runs edged and safe! Haddin comes down again, makes room, and slashes at a short of a length delivery outside off. The edge flies between the keeper and a wide first slip. Collins Obuya dives to his left at the wide first slip but can't reach it
Otieno to Haddin, 1 run steered towards third man for a single
Otieno to Ponting, no run Ponting strides forward a long way and defends towards point
Otieno to Ponting, no run Ponting slashes hard this time and hits the ball with the toe end of his bat into the ground towards first slip

NN Odhiambo to Haddin, 1 run a full ball and Haddin digs it out towards the off side and wants a risky single. Haddin would have been gone had there been a direct hit at the bowler's end, he stumbles and falls as he makes his ground
NN Odhiambo to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot towards the off
NN Odhiambo to Ponting, FOUR runs strays down leg this time and Ponting glances the ball off his pads to the fine leg-boundary
NN Odhiambo to Ponting, no run Ponting strides forward and pushes a good length ball from outside off towards point
NN Odhiambo to Ponting, no run Ponting moves forward again to a ball that is a touch shorter than the previous one and plays towards point

NN Odhiambo to Ponting, FOUR runs that's a rare slog from Ponting, drags a length ball from outside off high in the air over midwicket. He hasn't timed it well so the ball falls well inside the boundary and eventually reaches it after a mix-up in the field
Otieno to Haddin, 1 run There's that trigger movement from Haddin again, forward and towards leg to drive on the off. He hits it to mid-off where a fumble allows the single
Otieno to Ponting, no run Ponting moves across his stumps to work the ball off his pads on the leg side but can't make contact
Otieno to Ponting, 1 run Ponting drives off the front foot towards wide mid-off where there's a fumble once again from Odoyo. Looks a bit heavy, does Odoyo

Otieno to Haddin, FOUR runs that is a wonderful shot, he moves a long way outside leg and this time he uses the room to steer the ball behind point and wide of the fielder at third man. The keeper was standing deep and Haddin was standing out of his crease

Otieno to Haddin, FOUR runs this time Haddin walks forward and towards the off to swing a length ball powerfully through midwicket for four. The keeper needs to come back up, Haddin is moving freely out of his crease here
Otieno to Haddin, no run short of a length and slower, Haddin comes forward and mis-times the cut towards point
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run Ponting moves back and nudges the ball off his pads behind square
J Ngoche to Haddin, 1 run a quicker one on middle stump, Haddin gets an inside edge behind square as he tries to defend
J Ngoche to Ponting, no run Ponting strides forward to a slower ball and defends on the off side
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run a flighted delivery on off, drawing Ponting forward as he plays towards midwicket
J Ngoche to Haddin, 1 run Haddin moves forward and nudges the ball behind square for a single
J Ngoche to Ponting, no run Ponting goes back and defends the ball towards the bowler
Kamande to Haddin, no run worked off the pads behind square, Haddin wants one but short fine leg is too quick
Kamande to Haddin, 1 run driven off the front foot into a gap at cover
Kamande to Ponting, no run Ponting lunges forward and defends towards the bowler
Kamande to Ponting, 1 run Ponting moves across and nudges off the pads through the leg side
Kamande to Haddin, no run nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
Kamande to Haddin, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket
J Ngoche to Ponting, FOUR runs a touch too short and Ponting has time to move back and drive the ball in front of point, the fielder gives chase but in vain
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run Ponting lunges forward and across and nudges the ball on the leg side
J Ngoche to Haddin, no run Haddin stays in his crease and works the ball towards midwicket
J Ngoche to Haddin, 1 run Haddin stays back again and flicks the ball in front of square
J Ngoche to Ponting, 5 wide that's fired down leg side, Ponting tried to paddle it but didn't get a touch on it
J Ngoche to Ponting, no run quite a bit of turn into the right-hander, Ponting defends on the front foot
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run played off the pads through midwicket
Kamande to Ponting, no run Ponting moves forward and defends towards midwicket
Kamande to Ponting, no run played off the front foot towards midwicket
Kamande to Ponting, 1 run Ponting comes forward and works the ball through square

Kamande to Haddin, no run loud appeal for lbw as Haddin moves across his stumps and tries to hoick the ball off the front foot over the leg side. Will Kenya review the not out decision? No they won't. Or have they? They've taken too long to decide ...
Kamande to Haddin, no run driven back firmly off the front foot towards the bowler
Kamande to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin comes forward and swings the ball off his pads towards deep square
J Ngoche to Ponting, no run Ponting strides forward and blocks towards the bowler
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run Ponting gets on to the front foot and turns the ball off his pads behind square
J Ngoche to Haddin, no run Haddin defends on the front foot towards the off side

J Ngoche to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin plants his foot forward, gets to the pitch of the ball, and swings it high over wide long-on. Sweetly timed and the ball clears the boundary. One-bounce four actually ...
J Ngoche to Haddin, 1 run played off the pads behind square for a single. Slight misunderstanding between the batsmen
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run swept behind square for a single
Kamande to Ponting, 1 run played off the back foot behind square for a single
Kamande to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin gets to his half-century by dabbing the ball fine towards third man. Not the most fluent, but it's doing the job
Kamande to Haddin, no run defended back towards the bowler
Kamande to Haddin, no run defended on the front foot towards midwicket
Kamande to Haddin, no run the ball spins into Haddin and hits him on the pad as he tries to play on the leg side
Kamande to Haddin, FOUR runs short outside off stump and Haddin plays another deft dab to the third-man boundary
J Ngoche to Ponting, no run Ponting moves forward and pushes the ball from middle towards midwicket
J Ngoche to Ponting, no run Ponting misses the powerful sweep and gets hit on the pad
J Ngoche to Ponting, 1 run lots of turn into Ponting, sharp turn, and he nudges the ball off the back foot towards short third man
J Ngoche to Haddin, no run Haddin steps out and pushes the ball towards the bowler
J Ngoche to Haddin, SIX runs superb timing! Haddin steps out and lofts the ball cleanly over the long-on boundary. There was a fielder there but cleared him comfortably
J Ngoche to Haddin, 1 run played towards point for a single
Kamande to Haddin, no run Haddin stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
Kamande to Haddin, 1 run Haddin drives on the front foot towards long off
Kamande to Ponting, no run nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
Kamande to Ponting, no run Ponting moves across and defends on the front foot
Kamande to Ponting, no run Ponting moves back, waits for the ball to turn and cuts towards short third man
Kamande to Ponting, 1 run pushed down to long on for a single
C Obuya to Ponting, 1 run tossed up outside of, driven off the front foot towards cover
C Obuya to Haddin, 1 run driven fluently off the front foot towards wide long-off
C Obuya to Ponting, 1 run driven to long off this time for a single
C Obuya to Haddin, 1 run driven off the front foot through point for a single
C Obuya to Ponting, 1 run looped up on off stump, Ponting drives towards mid-off
C Obuya to Haddin, 1 run that's a nice and lovely full toss on the pads, Ponting pushes it gently down the ground to long on. Friendly cricket all around.
Kamande to Haddin, no run defended from the crease on the leg side
Kamande to Haddin, no run played back to the bowler
Kamande to Haddin, no run Haddin moves forward and defends on the leg side
Kamande to Haddin, OUT caught at deep midwicket! Haddin moves forward, picks up the ball from outside off and swings it high and straight to the man on the deep midwicket boundary
Kamande to Clarke, no run Clarke stays back and plays the ball off his pads towards short fine leg
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run almost, the fielder at midwicket dived but couldn't cut off Clarke's nudge off the pads
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run Clarke steps out and flicks the ball off his pads through square
C Obuya to Ponting, 1 run played towards point from the crease
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run full toss, Clarke comes forward and mis-times the swat through the leg side

C Obuya to Ponting, OUT loud appeal for lbw as Ponting attempts to work the ball on the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad. The umpire says not out and Kenya want a review. That one didn't turn, was going straight through. A terrific review it is for that was hitting mi
C Obuya to White, no run White goes back and defends on the leg side
C Obuya to White, 1 wide Obuya tosses one up so wide outside off, pitched beyond the wide lines
C Obuya to White, (no ball) 1 run another high friendly full toss at chest height, White swats it tamely towards deep square leg. Friendly cricket all around.
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run forced off the back foot toward long off
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long off for a single
Kamande to White, no run White gets on to the front foot and defends on the leg side
Kamande to White, no run wide outside off stump and White cuts off the back foot through point
Kamande to White, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards long on
Kamande to Clarke, 5 wide he's strayed down leg side, Clarke misses the glance and the keeper misses the take
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run Clarke gets down the pitch and drives towards long on

Kamande to White, OUT oh wow! Did Kamande become Murali? White is shocked and with good reason. That ball pitched a long way outside off and spun viciously into the right-hander. White pushed forward in defence and the ball spun past his bat and hit off and middle. More middle t
C Obuya to Clarke, no run played off the back foot to point
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run cut off the back foot through point for a single
C Obuya to Hussey, FOUR runs a nice and high full toss and Hussey accepts the offering by driving through cover to get off the mark. Obuya's bowled a lot of these full tosses
C Obuya to Hussey, 1 run short and wide outside off, Hussey waits on the back foot and cuts through cover
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run a massive long hop and Clarke simply waits and cuts through point
C Obuya to Hussey, 2 runs another full toss, Obuya suffering from the yips, Hussey plays towards cover where the fielder fumbles
Kamande to Clarke, no run driven towards mid on off the front foot
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run played off the pads through square leg
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run played off the pads towards short fine leg
Kamande to Clarke, 1 wide bowled wide outside off stump, Clarke covers for the turn and lets it go. The ball does not turn
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run played off the pads past the fielder at short fine leg
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run played off the front foot towards point
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run driven off the front foot towards mid-off for a single
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run short ball on off, Clarke moves back and cuts towards point where the fielder mis-fields
C Obuya to Hussey, 2 runs too short and Hussey pulls powerfully off the back foot, the fielder at deep square slides to make the save
C Obuya to Hussey, 1 run played off the pads behind square
C Obuya to Clarke, FOUR runs excellent placement and timing. Clarke comes forward, takes the ball on the full, and drives past the fielder at mid-on
C Obuya to Clarke, 2 runs full toss and Clarke steps out and works it through midwicket
C Obuya to Clarke, 1 run short ball this time on of, Clarke goes back and cuts through cover point
Kamande to Clarke, no run White steps out again and plays towards the bowler
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run driven off the front foot towards mid off
Kamande to Hussey, no run flat and a touch short, Hussey moves back and punches towards cover
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot through cover for a single
Kamande to Clarke, no run defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run Kamande stops before releasing that, cut off the back foot towards short third man
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run played off the pads behind square for a single
J Ngoche to Hussey, 1 run pitches outside leg and turns into the pads, Hussey stays back and plays the ball behind square
J Ngoche to Clarke, no run Clarke moves forward and then defends after failing to reach the pitch of the ball
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run played off the back foot through cover
J Ngoche to Hussey, 1 run Hussey plays back and works the ball off his pads through midwicket
J Ngoche to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke works the ball off his pads through square and Hussey has to hurry and dive to complete the second
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run short ball and Hussey moves back and taps the ball towards long-off
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and drives towards long off
Kamande to Hussey, no run Hussey moves back to work on the leg side and gets a leading edge towards the bowler
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot through cover
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long on
Kamande to Hussey, no run played towards mid-off
J Ngoche to Clarke, no run played towards mid on this time
J Ngoche to Clarke, no run shorter and quicker, played off the back foot on the off side
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg for a single
J Ngoche to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves back and works the ball off his pads through square
J Ngoche to Clarke, no run Clarke moves across his stumps to flick through square but misses and gets hit on the pad. The bowler appeals but that was missing leg
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run driven to long on for a single
Odoyo to Clarke, 3 runs short of a length outside off with the keeper standing up, Clarke cuts off the back foot and the fielder on the deep point boundary does splendidly to dive and save the four
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run Hussey ticks along with a cut off the back foot towards third man
Odoyo to Clarke, FOUR runs terrific timing from Clarke who beats the man at extra cover with a drive from the crease
Odoyo to Clarke, no run played back to the bowler
Odoyo to Clarke, no run pushed off the back foot towards cover
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run Clarke drives fluently off the front foot for another single
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and clips towards midwicket where the fielder dives and fumbles
J Ngoche to Hussey, 1 run played off the pads through square leg
J Ngoche to Clarke, no run flat and short, Clarke moves back and works the ball towards midwicket
J Ngoche to Clarke, 2 runs flicked off the pads through square leg
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves back and nudges the ball through square leg
J Ngoche to Hussey, 1 run played off the back foot down the ground for a single
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run pitched far outside leg, Hussey goes back to pull down to fine leg but mis-times the shot
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and drives towards long off for a single
Kamande to Hussey, FOUR runs fired down leg side and Hussey glances it fine to the boundary, easy as you please
Kamande to Hussey, 1 run Hussey moves back and pushes down the ground towards long off
Kamande to Clarke, 1 run played down the ground again for one more
Kamande to Hussey, no run left alone outside off stump
J Ngoche to Clarke, FOUR runs strays down leg side and this time Clarke gets a bit of bat on it to glance it fine past the keeper
J Ngoche to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and plays the ball off his toes through midwicket

J Ngoche to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to work the ball on the leg side off the back foot and misses, he gets hit on the pad and Kenya appeal. Will they review the umpire's not out decision? No they won't
J Ngoche to Hussey, FOUR runs down leg side again and Hussey works the ball fine past the keeper for four more
J Ngoche to Hussey, 1 run Hussey stays in his crease and plays the ball through point
J Ngoche to Clarke, no run fired in fast on middle and leg, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot through cover
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 bye Odoyo beats Clarke's drive off the front foot and the ball beats the keeper as well, deflecting off his glove towards third man
Odoyo to Hussey, 2 runs worked off the back foot towards backward square
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 wide very wide down leg side ...
Odoyo to Hussey, no run shorter length and Hussey plays a short arm jab towards midwicket
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run Hussey stays in his crease and dabs behind point
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run good length and straight, Clarke moves forward and drives past the bowler
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, no run full ball on the pads, Clarke misses out on the flick, that was there for the taking
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 2 wide wide down leg side, too far for Clarke to get bat on the ball
NN Odhiambo to Hussey, 3 runs terrific cover drive, has the Hussey trademark all over it. Moves forward and makes crisp contact, forcing the fielders in the deep to dive to save the four
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, no run Clarke moves forward and taps the ball towards midwicket
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 1 run short of a length, angling into the body. Clarke turns it off his hips to reach a half-century, off 52 balls. A fluent innings
NN Odhiambo to Hussey, no run pitches outside leg and angles into the pads. Hussey plays it towards square leg
NN Odhiambo to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to run a good length ball that angles across him towards third man, but gets beaten
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run full ball on off and middle, Clarke drives off the front foot towards mid-off
Odoyo to Hussey, 2 runs a touch short and Hussey plays the short arm pull towards deep midwicket
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run a full toss but Hussey's drive can't beat the fielder at cover
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run pushed past the bowler from the crease for a single
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run played off the back foot towards cover point for one
Odoyo to Clarke, no run played off the back foot towards the bowler
NN Odhiambo to Hussey, FOUR runs a full toss and Hussey smashes the ball through square leg with a perfectly-placed pull shot
NN Odhiambo to Hussey, 1 run nudged off the pads towards fine leg for a single

NN Odhiambo to Clarke, FOUR runs terrific shot, Clarke moves forward and towards the off, the ball was on his pads and he flicks it over the fielder at short fine leg for four, the 100 partnership comes up
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and drives towards long on
NN Odhiambo to Hussey, 1 run Hussey turns a full ball off his pads behind square for a single
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, no run a useful yorker, Clarke can't do much with that but dig it out
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run well played Huss! Gets to his fifty by forcing the ball off the back foot through cover. He's been a dynamo in Australia's middle order and they love it that he's back
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run played past the bowler for a single, that was in the air towards Odoyo but a touch high, it went off the leading edge
Odoyo to Hussey, 3 runs Hussey pulls off the back foot and the fielder in the deep spots the ball racing across the turf rather late
Odoyo to Clarke, 2 runs full ball angling into middle stump, flicked off the front foot towards deep midwicket
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 bye Clarke backs away to make room and hit a length ball through the off side, he misses and the keeper also fails to collect it
Odoyo to Hussey, 1 run Hussey strides forward and drives through cover

NN Odhiambo to Hussey, OUT caught at long-on! The length was a touch full, the line was outside off and the pace might have been a touch slower. Hussey drags the ball from outside off towards David Obuya who ran in a bit and took the catch. Hussey was aiming to hit it straighter
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, FOUR runs a high full toss and Clarke moves across and whips it off his hips towards the fine leg boundary
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and nudges the ball towards midwicket
NN Odhiambo to Smith, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards point for a quick single. A direct hit at the bowler's end would have dismissed him
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, FOUR runs shot, Clarke makes room by moving towards leg and cuts a length ball from the stumps behind point
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 1 run a full toss and Clarke clips it off his pads toward deep midwicket
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run worked off the pad behind square for a single
Odoyo to Smith, no run Smith barely moves his feet as he prods this one back to the bowler
Odoyo to Smith, 1 run full ball on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run played off the back foot towards long on for one
Odoyo to Smith, 1 leg bye strays down leg side, Smith tries to nudge it but gets hit on the pad
Odoyo to Clarke, 1 run worked off the pads through midwicket
Otieno to Clarke, FOUR runs short ball outside off, Clarke gets into position early and pulls it cleanly into the gap between deep midwicket and long on
Otieno to Clarke, 2 runs a high full toss and Clarke mis-times his pull off the front foot, it goes towards long-on and falls short of the fielder
Otieno to Clarke, SIX runs another full toss, and this time Clarke does it, pulling the ball and timing it well enough to cause a flutter in the people beyond the midwicket boundary
Otieno to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke steers the ball towards third man where the fielder has a bit of work to do
Otieno to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and flicks the ball through square for a single
Otieno to Smith, 1 run Smith flicks the ball off his pads but doesn't make contact actually, leg byes. Now why is a team rewarded when the batsmen doesn't hit the ball?
NN Odhiambo to Smith, no run short of a length and Smith lines up the pull but fails to connect
NN Odhiambo to Smith, 1 run full toss and Smith makes room and smashes it to the man on the cover boundary
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, no run the bowler strays on to the pads, Clarke moves across and attempts to glance but misses it
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke moves outside leg to make room and lofts a ball that follows him towards long-on
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke moves towards leg and drives a length ball with lots of power, the fielder at cover, Kamande, dives to his right and makes an outstanding save
NN Odhiambo to Clarke, no run a slower ball and Clarke had finished the pull by the time the ball arrived. Odhiambo beams in delight
Otieno to Smith, 1 run smashed with power to the man on the long-on boundary
Otieno to Clarke, 1 leg bye a slower ball from round the wicket, worked off the body behind square
Otieno to Smith, FOUR runs Smith clears his front foot out of the way and aims to hit the ball over the midwicket boundary. Instead, he gets an inside edge past the keeper to bring up the 300
Otieno to Smith, 1 leg bye Smith gets cramped for room with this line from round the wicket and mis-times the pull behind square
Otieno to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves across and works the ball off his pads behind square
Otieno to Smith, 2 runs Smith makes room by moving towards leg and drives straight to long-on, where a fumble allows the second

NN Odhiambo to Clarke, OUT whoops, he's holed out to long-on. Clarke tried to launch a full ball over the man on the long-on boundary. He didn't get enough elevation or distance and Patel took a fine catch at shin height. That was travelling to him quickly and Clarke's World Cup
NN Odhiambo to Johnson, 1 run pushed off the front foot through point for a single
NN Odhiambo to Smith, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Smith mis-times the drive towards cover
NN Odhiambo to Johnson, FOUR runs Johnson launches a length ball over cover, high over cover, and the ball beats Patel on the wide long-on boundary. That bounced and spun away and over him
NN Odhiambo to Johnson, 1 run fuller and slower, pushed towards the off for a single

NN Odhiambo to Smith, FOUR runs that's gone miles in the air! Smith plays some curious shots. He cleared his front foot out of the way and attempted an almighty slog. He was aiming over midwicket but the ball went in the direction of square leg
Otieno to Johnson, 1 run short ball and Johnson pulls towards deep midwicket
Otieno to Smith, 1 leg bye that was a very slow ball and it kept very low and hit Smith on the pad, it would have missed off stump
Otieno to Johnson, 1 leg bye The ball angled into the left-hander and Johnson's attempt at smashing it towards midwicket missed. The ball hit his pad and went towards short third man
Otieno to Smith, 1 run punched toward long on for a single
Otieno to Johnson, FOUR runs full ball and on the pads, Johnson glances it fine past the fielder at short fine leg
Otieno to Johnson, 1 run short ball outside off stump, Johnson swats it towards deep midwicket

Australia have had a nice little batting work out. They needed it as well, after not batting since February 25. I'm going to stretch my legs and will be back at 18.45 local time for the chase. See you shortly.

The Kenya chase is moments away ... They face a trail by pace from Lee, Tait, and Johnson. Ponting's talking to his team before making his way to the middle. Obanda and Ouma are Kenya's openers. Lee has the new ball ... and runs in with three slips waiting for the edge.
Lee to Ouma, no run outswing at brisk pace, Ouma fishes and misses, that angled in towards the stumps before curving away past the bat
Lee to Ouma, 2 runs Kenya are away, Lee gets a bit too straight but this time the ball doesn't swing as much, played off the pads through square leg
Lee to Ouma, no run banged in short outside off stump, Ouma begins to play it and then lets the ball pass
Lee to Ouma, no run another fast outswinger at 146kph, the line was outside off and it veered away sharply, Haddin has to move quickly to collect
Lee to Ouma, no run full and straight from Lee on off stump, pushed towards cover point from the crease
Lee to Ouma, 1 run Ouma pushes forward and gets a thick outside edge towards third man
Tait to Ouma, no run short of a length, pushing the batsman on the back foot, played towards cover
Tait to Ouma, 1 run Clarke missed at the non-striker's end or else the batsman was a goner, he pushed towards point and set off for a risky single
Tait to Obanda, no run Tait's pace is not giving the batsman any time to do anything but stay in the crease and block. That was 144 kph
Tait to Obanda, no run played off the back foot towards mid-off, the length was full but the batsman stayed in his crease, 147 kph ...
Tait to Obanda, no run a forceful shot off the back foot but it is to the fielder at cover
Tait to Obanda, 1 wide the short ball banged down leg side
Tait to Obanda, 1 wide Tait pitches short of a length but strays down leg side once again
Tait to Obanda, SIX runs short and wide outside off stump, Obanda flashes and flashes hard, slashing the ball hard and flat over the third-man boundary.
Lee to Ouma, no run Lee bowls the yorker at 145 kph, it's on target but Ouma digs it out
Lee to Ouma, no run full and straight again from Lee at searing pace, played towards square leg
Lee to Ouma, no run good length just outside off, defended from the crease on the leg side
Lee to Ouma, no run Lee sends down a bouncer at 138 kph, forcing the batsman to duck

Lee to Ouma, OUT edged ... and taken! Lee follows the bouncer with a full ball that begins to swing away from the batsman from around off stump. Ouma chases after it with the drive and edges to Haddin who takes a simple catch. Excellent ball after that bouncer. Full and swinging
Lee to C Obuya, no run defends a good length delivery towards the bowler
Tait to Obanda, 1 wide a full and fast ball down leg side again. Tait's radar is wonky today.
Tait to Obanda, no run a short of a length ball angles into the batsman and hits him high on the pad and thigh at 148 kph
Tait to Obanda, 2 runs that pull is pre-meditated but he's made good contact with the length ball and placed it through midwicket

Tait to Obanda, SIX runs that is a monstrous hit! Obanda take a bow, you've hit it on the roof! Well not really but it went miles. Tait bowled a length ball and Obanda launched it off the front foot several rows back over the long-on boundary. That was a slower ball.
Tait to Obanda, no run short ball outside off, looks to cut but gets beaten
Tait to Obanda, no run Tait responds with the bouncer and Obanda avoids it
Lee to C Obuya, no run Lee hits the pad with a good length ball but that was missing leg
Lee to C Obuya, 1 run flicked through square leg for a single
Lee to Obuya, 1 run he moves forward to drive a full ball towards point where the fielder dives to take the pace off the ball
Lee to C Obuya, no run short of a length from Lee and quite straight, Collins Obuya gets behind the line and defends
Lee to C Obuya, no run Lee hits the pad with a full and fast delivery but that was sliding down leg as well
Lee to C Obuya, no run Lee swings a full ball into the right-hander, on middle stump, line, the batsman defends with a straight bat
Tait to Obuya, 1 wide the bouncer and David Obuya ducks under it
Tait to Obuya, no run that was full and fast outside off at 146 kph, the ball hit bat rather than the other way around as David Obuya swatted outside off stump
Tait to Obuya, 1 leg bye Tait fires another full ball but it's on the pads and hits them before going towards fine leg
Tait to C Obuya, no run short of a length but wide outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
Tait to C Obuya, no run Tait angles a full ball into the right hander, Collins Obuya barely moves before bringing his bat down in time to squirt the ball through square
Tait to C Obuya, no run good length but outside off, Collins Obuya lets it go through to Haddin
Tait to C Obuya, 2 runs full ball outside off and Collins Obuya pushes it in front of point
Lee to Obuya, 1 run Lee fires in another yorker, which Obuya - David - manages to keep out
Lee to C Obuya, no run full and straight, the batsman plays it back towards the bowler, Lee fields on his follow through
Lee to C Obuya, 1 run another yorker from Lee and once again it's kept out, played to midwicket
Lee to Obuya, no run short of a length and just outside off, David Obuya fishes and misses
Lee to Obuya, no run short of a length on the hips, fended on the leg side
Lee to Obuya, no run fuller length and it's driven off the front foot to the fielder at point
Johnson to C Obuya, 1 wide ah now that's the widest wide of the World Cup. Haddin has to dive a long way to his right to collect it
Johnson to C Obuya, 1 wide now this one is down leg side, Johnson's radar is wonky too.
Johnson to C Obuya, no run much better, good length around off stump, played off the back foot on the off side
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Collins Obuya drives loosely at one that angles across him without moving his feet. It was a full ball and it beat him
Johnson to C Obuya, no run once again Collins Obuya pushes forward at a full ball that slants across him and gets beaten
Johnson to C Obuya, no run this is fuller and much wider outside off, Collins Obuya lets it go
Johnson to C Obuya, no run short of a length and straight, he gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat
Johnson to C Obuya, FOUR runs full ball outside off stump, Collins Obuya drives it behind point and even Lee's graceful, athletic slide on the boundary can't stop the four. Over to brother David now.
Lee to Obuya, no run a sharp and well directed bouncer, forcing David to duck for cover
Lee to Obuya, no run Lee pitches on a good length and is very straight, defended on the leg side from the crease
Lee to Obuya, 1 run length ball outside off, mis-timed towards cover off the front foot
Lee to C Obuya, 1 run good length on a tight line outside off stump, the batsman has to play it and he pokes tentatively off the back foot, the outside edge goes towards third man
Lee to Obuya, FOUR runs David Obuya moves forward and swats a length delivery through cover for four, nicely timed and placed well
Lee to Obuya, 1 run defended from the crease towards cover and that is an extremely well-run single
Johnson to Obuya, no run full ball just outside off, played off the front foot towards mid-off
Johnson to Obuya, no run a well-directed bouncer, over the stumps, the batsman ducks under it
Johnson to Obuya, FOUR runs nice shot! David Obuya moves a touch across and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg, good use of the wrists

Johnson to Obuya, OUT there's a mix-up between the brothers and David Obuya is run out. David pushed the ball off his hips towards midwicket and sprinted for the run. Collins, perhaps seeing that Hussey was sprinting towards the ball from square leg with no signs of hamstring tro
Johnson to Mishra, no run fended off the back foot and the ball beats the outside edge
Johnson to Mishra, no run Mishra decides to let this one pass him as it angles across the body from over the wicket
Smith to C Obuya, 1 run played towards the fielder on the deep square boundary
Smith to Mishra, no run bowled flat and short and wide outside off, Mishra cuts it into the ground towards backward point
Smith to Mishra, no run driven towards cover
Smith to Mishra, 1 run cut off the back foot towards deep point
Smith to C Obuya, 2 runs pushed off the front foot towards cover where Ponting moves swiftly towards his left and picks up. He turns around and throws to Haddin but it is off target
Smith to C Obuya, no run defended off the front foot
Johnson to Mishra, FOUR runs driven off the front foot as Johnson angles the ball into the right-hander from round the wicket, the thick outside edge flies through backward point for four
Johnson to Mishra, no run short of a length outside off stump, Mishra lifts his bat out of the way
Johnson to Mishra, 1 run Mishra reaches out for a wide ball and drives through cover, he's mis-timed it
Johnson to C Obuya, no run good length ball outside off, the batsman lets it go
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Johnson draws the batsman into the drive with his length and line from round the wicket, and beats the edge
Johnson to C Obuya, no run defended on the back foot
Smith to Mishra, no run Mishra attempts to sweep, but it doesn't come off
Smith to Mishra, no run left alone outside off stump
Smith to Mishra, no run tossed up outside off, Mishra comes forward and blocks
Smith to Mishra, SIX runs he's pulled this! Short ball, a real half-tracker, and Mishra moved quickly on to the back foot and hoisted it over deep midwicket
Smith to Mishra, FOUR runs short again and Mishra pulls along the ground wide of the fielder at mid-on
Smith to Mishra, no run driven off the front foot on the off side
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Johnson pitches the ball outside off from round the wicket and bounces it past the outside edge
Johnson to C Obuya, no run short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot towards point
Johnson to C Obuya, no run the slower ball outside off stump, the batsman pokes and misses
Johnson to C Obuya, no run pushed off the front foot towards point
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Johnson bowls a full toss outside off stump but the batsman lets it go
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Johnson bowls another full one wide outside off but the batsman chases this one and gets beaten
Smith to Mishra, no run defended towards mid on
Smith to Mishra, no run chopped off the back foot towards point
Smith to Mishra, FOUR runs Mishra charges and lofts Smith with the turn cleanly to the extra cover boundary, quality shot
Smith to Mishra, 1 run cut off the back foot towards point
Smith to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards point
Smith to Mishra, 1 run short ball and Mishra pulls off the back foot towards wide mid-on
Johnson to Mishra, no run Mishra drives at a full ball from Johnson and gets beaten outside off
Johnson to Mishra, 1 run full toss outside off stump, Mishra reaches for it and plays the ball towards deep point
Johnson to C Obuya, no run full ball angling into the right-hander, pushed off the front foot towards cover
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Collins Obuya pushes forward at a slightly slower ball and gets an outside edge that falls short of the fielder at point
Johnson to C Obuya, no run the short ball bowled close to the body, Collins Obuya just about manages to avoid it
Johnson to C Obuya, 2 runs full and wide outside off, Obuya reaches out and squirts it past point to White on the boundary
Smith to Mishra, no run driven off the front foot towards cover
Smith to Mishra, 1 run nudged off the pads behind square for a single
Smith to C Obuya, no run cut off the back foot towards short third man
Smith to C Obuya, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long off
Smith to Mishra, no run played back to the bowler
Smith to Mishra, no run bowled full and straight, Mishra moves forward and blocks
Krejza to C Obuya, no run flighted delivery outside off stump and Obuya misses the sweep
Krejza to C Obuya, FOUR runs Obuya plays the reverse swat to a full ball outside off and hits it to the third man boundary
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya charges, realises he isn't to the pitch of the ball, and defends
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards point
Krejza to Mishra, no run tossed up just outside off, defended on the front foot
Krejza to Mishra, no run cut in the air but the ball falls short of point
Smith to C Obuya, 1 run cut off the back foot towards deep point
Smith to Mishra, no run defended towards point from the crease
Smith to Mishra, 1 run full toss, driven to mid-on for a quick single
Smith to C Obuya, no run bowled down the leg side, the ball hits the pad after the batsman misses the glance
Smith to C Obuya, no run left alone outside off stump
Smith to C Obuya, no run tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run Krejza slants the ball from round the wicket across the right-hander, cut off the back foot
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run nudged off the pads towards midwicket
Krejza to Mishra, no run Mishra moves back and nudges the ball towards short fine leg
Krejza to Mishra, no run defended to the bowler
Krejza to Mishra, 2 runs bowled wide outside off stump, Mishra uses the width to play the drive and hits it in the air but through cover
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run turned off the pads towards square and the batsmen run the single after some hesitation
Smith to Mishra, FOUR runs Mishra sweeps the ball towards long leg where Tait runs towards the ball gingerly and makes a clumsy dive in vain
Smith to Mishra, 1 run played towards square leg
Smith to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the front foot through point
Smith to Mishra, 1 run nudged off the pads through square leg
Smith to C Obuya, no run pushed off the front foot towards mid off
Smith to C Obuya, FOUR runs width offered outside off and the batsman cuts deftly past the fielder at short third man
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run Krejza angles the ball across and then spins it into the right-hander, played off the pads towards square
Krejza to C Obuya, no run played back to the bowler off the front foot
Krejza to C Obuya, no run pushed off the front foot towards cover
Krejza to C Obuya, no run defended on the front foot towards cover
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya charges, Krejza bowls it quick and flat and the batsman defends
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya strides forward and defends a flighted delivery on the off side
Tait to Mishra, no run hits a good length outside off and beats the batsman, Mishra was late on the forward defence
Tait to Mishra, 5 wide that is a horrendous ball. Awful, terrible and call it anything else too. Tait sprays it so wide outside leg that it would have missed a second set of stumps
Tait to Mishra, no run full ball but the line is outside off this time, Mishra tries to drive but misses
Tait to Mishra, no run good length and rather straight, defended on the leg side from the crease
Tait to Mishra, no run good length outside off and much too fast for Mishra who played the cut after the ball had whizzed past
Tait to Mishra, no run another length delivery that is far too quick for Mishra to get bat on it outside off
Tait to Mishra, no run defended on the back foot towards the off side, the line was straighter so that was easier for Mishra to play
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run Obuya charges and drives through extra cover
Krejza to Mishra, FOUR runs too full outside off and Mishra plays a thumping cover drive, he used the width on offer and hit it cleanly
Krejza to Mishra, no run tossed up outside of stump, driven towards mid-on
Krejza to Mishra, no run nudged off the pads towards the leg side
Krejza to Mishra, no run defended towards midwicket
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run turned behind square for a single
Tait to Mishra, no run full and straight, played towards midwicket on the front foot. 147 kph
Tait to Mishra, no run the bouncer and Mishra ducks under it
Tait to Mishra, no run good length outside off, Mishra tries to cut but is beaten for pace again
Tait to Mishra, no run Haddin leaps to his left to tumble and make a special take, but that ball had clipped the pad I think. Full ball down leg and Mishra missed the flick
Tait to Mishra, no run defended on the off side
Tait to Mishra, 1 run Mishra chases a full and wide ball and slashes it in the air over point to the fielder in the deep
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run played off the pads through square leg
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run Obuya plays the reverse swat from off stump towards short third man
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run driven off the front foot down the ground
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya tries to sweep but misses the ball, the ball misses the stumps, and Haddin misses the take
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run this time he connects and sweeps to deep square
Krejza to Mishra, no run defended back to the bowler
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the front foot through cover point, that's Michael Clarke bowling by the way
Clarke to Mishra, 1 run the sweep is top edged but it falls safely towards fine leg
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run Obuya pushes off the front foot towards the off side
Clarke to Mishra, FOUR runs tossed up outside off stump and Mishra leans forward and plays a drive through extra cover that pierces the gap between the fielders at long off and deep cover
Clarke to Mishra, no run cut of the back foot towards cover, he's on 49 ...
Clarke to Mishra, no run quicker ball, defended on the back foot towards the off
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya misses the sweep
Krejza to C Obuya, no run nudged off the pads on the front foot towards square
Krejza to C Obuya, no run defended on the back foot towards the leg side
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya gets down on one knee to sweep again but misses
Krejza to C Obuya, no run defended towards the bowler
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the front foot through cover point. Mishra will have to wait a while longer for his first fifty against the World Champs
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run driven off the front foot through extra cover

Clarke to Mishra, 1 run well played Mishra! He gets to fifty by sweeping towards fine leg. He raises his bat to an appreciative Bangalore crowd. A fifty in the World Cup against the reigning champions, that is something to treasure.
Clarke to C Obuya, no run full toss splayed to point
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run pushed towards cover for one more
Clarke to Mishra, no run driven off the front foot towards extra cover
Clarke to Mishra, 1 run Mishra gets caught on the crease and defends awkwardly, he was lucky to edge hat on to his pad
Krejza to Mishra, no run played off the pads behind square
Krejza to Mishra, FOUR runs Mishra skips down the pitch, gets to the ball, and drives it in the air but through the gap between extra cover and mid-off
Krejza to Mishra, 2 runs short ball outside off stump, Mishra cuts off the back foot towards third man
Krejza to Mishra, no run Mishra strides forward and defends
Krejza to Mishra, 2 runs shorter length an wider outside off stump, cut deftly past the fielder at short third man
Krejza to Mishra, no run pushed off the back foot towards short third man once again
Clarke to C Obuya, no run cut off the back foot towards point
Clarke to C Obuya, no run defended on the front foot towards point
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run driven off the front foot towards deep cover
Clarke to Mishra, 2 runs bowled flat on the pads, nudged through square leg for a single
Clarke to Mishra, no run pushed off the front foot towards point
Clarke to Mishra, no run flat and straight, defended on the back foot
Krejza to C Obuya, FOUR runs Obuya charges and with mid-off in the circle he lofts the ball cleanly down to long-off. One-bounce four
Krejza to C Obuya, no run nudged off the pads towards square leg
Krejza to C Obuya, no run Obuya tries to paddle from outside off but misses
Krejza to C Obuya, no run nudged off the back foot towards midwicket
Krejza to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the back foot past the bowler, Krejza dives to his right but can't reach it
Krejza to Mishra, 1 run Mishra waits and nudges the ball behind square, that's the 100 partnership between these two. Terrific effort!
Clarke to Mishra, 1 run played off the pads behind square
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run played towards long off for one
Clarke to Mishra, 1 run Mishra gets down on one knee and sweeps towards deep backward square
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run cut off the back foot towards deep point
Clarke to Mishra, no run defended off the front foot towards the bowler
Clarke to Mishra, no run Clarke pitches the ball on off and spins it away, beating Mishra who tried to defend on the back foot
Watson to C Obuya, 1 run Obuya charges and turns the ball off his pads behind square
Watson to Mishra, no run good length ball jags back into Mishra from outside off, defended from the crease
Watson to Mishra, no run short of a length angling into the hips, Mishra tries to work it towards square but misses
Watson to Mishra, no run Mishra once again misses the nudge off the pads and gets hit, that was sliding down leg though
Watson to Mishra, no run tight line and length just outside off, Mishra defends from the crease again
Watson to Mishra, 1 run Watson appeals after hitting the pads as Mishra tries to defend on the back foot, that might have been slipping down leg
Clarke to Mishra, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards point
Clarke to C Obuya, no run driven from the crease towards cover
Clarke to C Obuya, no run
Clarke to C Obuya, 1 run edged from the crease towards square leg
Clarke to Mishra, no run played off the front foot towards point
Clarke to Mishra, 1 run down on one knee and a powerful sweep towards deep backward square
Watson to Mishra, FOUR runs full ball angling into middle and leg and Mishra dispatches it to the square leg boundary with a wristy flick
Watson to Mishra, 1 run good length outside off, dabbed off the back foot behind point for a single
Watson to C Obuya, 1 wide short ball but it's slanting down leg side, close to the body but wide all the same

Watson to C Obuya, OUT tragic way to go, Mishra is run out. It was perhaps the only way Australia were going to strike. Obuya dabbed the ball towards backward point and the batsmen decided to take on Clarke. Bad move. He swooped on the ball and hit the stumps direct at the strik
Watson to Odoyo, no run full ball swinging into the right-hander, driven towards mid-off
Watson to Odoyo, no run Lbw! surely? No there's an inside edge. It was full and straight and Odoyo moved right across his stumps and got hit on the boot, after an inside edge
Watson to Odoyo, no run he tried to play it on the on side but the ball hit the pad

Lee to C Obuya, no run that is some catch! Haddin covers a lot of ground and dives to his right with right glove outstretched to take the ball inches off the ground. Only it didn't come off the bat, the ball hit the batsman's chest
Lee to C Obuya, no run driven firmly off the front foot towards the bowler, Lee made a half-stop with his boot
Lee to C Obuya, no run full ball swinging into the right-hander, Obuya mis-times the off drive
Lee to C Obuya, 1 leg bye nudged off the hips towards fine leg
Lee to Odoyo, FOUR runs full ball on off and middle, Odoyo moves across his stumps and punches the ball firmly past the fielder at mid-on, superbly timed
Lee to Odoyo, no run full ball on middle stump, punched firmly once again, but this time straight to White at mid-on
Watson to C Obuya, no run a swish and a miss to a length ball outside off stump
Watson to C Obuya, no run good length ball cuts into the right-hander, Obuya defends from the crease towards Watson
Watson to C Obuya, SIX runs amazing shot to bring up the fifty! Obuya steps out and lofts a length ball cleanly through the line and sends it sailing over the long-off boundary
Watson to C Obuya, no run defended on the back foot on the leg side
Watson to C Obuya, no run short of a length ball gets big on Obuya and beats his cut
Watson to C Obuya, 1 run the batsmen take on Ponting after the cut is mis-timed towards cover point but the throw misses at the striker's end

Lee to C Obuya, 4 leg byes the short ball crashes into the batsman's shoulder, he was trying to avoid the ball, and it runs past Haddin to the fine-leg boundary. Leg byes for evasive action? Daft rule again.
Lee to C Obuya, 1 run played towards point off the front foot
Lee to Odoyo, no run another short of a length ball, played off the back foot towards point
Lee to Odoyo, no run Lee bowls another bouncer and this one is rather high, Odoyo plays the hook but it far from making contact
Lee to Odoyo, no run short of a length ball once again has the batsman in a tangle as he plays on the off side
Lee to Odoyo, no run yes, it's the full one, fast on off and middle. Odoyo does well to keep it out
Watson to C Obuya, no run pushed off the front foot past the bowler towards mid-off
Watson to C Obuya, no run short of a length around off stump, Obuya comes forward and then dabs towards point
Watson to C Obuya, no run short ball and Obuya lets the ball pass
Watson to C Obuya, 1 bye Obuya charges and tries to hit down the ground, they run a bye to Haddin
Watson to Odoyo, FOUR runs Odoyo backs away and has a slog at it, the inside edge runs past the stumps towards fine leg
Watson to Odoyo, 1 run flicked from off and middle stump towards midwicket, there was some shoddy run at the end of that one. Plonked his bat in the crease did Odoyo.
Lee to Odoyo, 1 run backs away to make room but ends up mis-hitting on the leg side
Lee to C Obuya, no run full and straight from Lee, played towards midwicket
Lee to C Obuya, 1 run edged, deftly past the wicketkeeper toward the fielder at third man
Lee to Odoyo, FOUR runs backs away and has a real thrash at a full and straight ball, crashing it through covers for four
Lee to Odoyo, 1 run backs away again and drives down the ground this time
Lee to C Obuya, no run a short ball and he ducks straight into it, the ball lobs up to Haddin off the helmet
Watson to Odoyo, 1 run gets a top edge as he pulls but it loops out of the reach of Haddin
Watson to C Obuya, SIX runs this time the pull is connected with and it travels well over deep square leg...that's too short at Watson's pace
Watson to C Obuya, 1 run fuller at the stumps, pushed into the off side
Watson to Odoyo, 1 run uses his feet and works it out to deep midwicket...first time Kenya have reached 200 at this World Cup
Watson to C Obuya, no run can't get this one away and it dribbles back to the bowler
Watson to C Obuya, no run very full outside off and beats the stroke
Tait to Odoyo, FOUR runs short ball and that's disappeared over Haddin's head for a one-bounce four. Odoyo backed away to swing at it and got an edge
Tait to Odoyo, no run full ball outside off, Odoyo backs away, swings and misses
Tait to Odoyo, 1 run full ball in the blockhole, Odoyo backs away and makes good contact with the drive, Clarke dives on the edge of the circle and stops it
Tait to C Obuya, (no ball) FOUR runs a lot full toss and Obuya launches it over mid-off, another one-bounce four. The yorker gone wrong from Tait.
Tait to C Obuya, (no ball) that was close to bowling him after the batsman missed the swing but that wouldn't have been out anyway because Tait over-stepped
Tait to Odoyo, 1 bye bowled, middle stump, but it doesn't count of course off a free hit, Odoyo backed away to swing and missed
Tait to C Obuya, 1 run a full ball in the blockhole, pushed past the bowler for a single
Tait to Odoyo, no run full and wide outside off, Odoyo backs away to make room and is too far away to make contact
Watson to C Obuya, 1 run played with an open face towards third man
Watson to Odoyo, no run defended on the front foot towards the off side
Watson to Odoyo, no run backs away to swing and hit through cover but he misses the length ball
Watson to Odoyo, 1 run played through midwicket for a single
Watson to C Obuya, SIX runs short ball, not too short either but Obuya sits on the back foot and pulls it flat over the deep midwicket boundary
Watson to C Obuya, FOUR runs a full toss on off stump and Obuya slashes it behind point for a boundary, he has a shot at a century here, against Australia, in a World cup
Johnson to Odoyo, no run Odoyo backs away and then plays back to the bowler
Johnson to Odoyo, 1 run played towards point with an open face
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Johnson slants a good length ball across the outside edge of Obuya's bat

Johnson to C Obuya, FOUR runs he's swung at this and the edge flies high towards third man, pitching once before going over the boundary. He was hoping to hit that down the ground and third man was in the circle
Johnson to C Obuya, 1 run hit toward deep cover for one more
Johnson to Odoyo, 1 run a charge and a biff towards long off
Watson to Odoyo, no run Odoyo tries to run it down to third man but gets beaten by the slower ball
Watson to Odoyo, no run he comes down the pitch and swings at one outside off, he misses once again
Watson to Odoyo, SIX runs he hasn't missed this! Odoyo charges, gets to the pitch of a length ball and lofts through the line, hitting it cleanly into the crowd at long off
Watson to Odoyo, no run dropped, Odoyo tried to cut it, instead he edged it straight into Haddin's gloves and then it pops right out. A tough chance.
Watson to Odoyo, no run Odoyo swings and misses
Watson to Odoyo, 1 run played off the back foot through the off side
Johnson to Odoyo, 1 run played towards third man for a single
Johnson to C Obuya, no run that's a wide ball outside off, Obuya chases it without moving feet and mis-times it towards the bowler
Johnson to C Obuya, 1 run full ball on middle stump, Obuya swats it in the air towards square leg, where it reaches the fielder on the bounce
Johnson to Odoyo, no run Odoyo charges and swings and misses, Obuya needs the strike, give it to him
Johnson to Odoyo, 1 run Odoyo gets hit on the thigh and he takes a single
Johnson to C Obuya, 2 runs short ball, Obuya tries to hook but gets a top edge over Lee's head at short fine leg
Tait to Odoyo, 1 run Tait follows Odoyo, hitting the batsman on the thigh with a short of a length delivery, some bat on that too
Tait to C Obuya, 1 run it's the yorker and Obuya squeezes it out towards deep square leg, not much else he could do with that one
Tait to Rakep, no run he backs away to make room and hits to mid-on, the fielder is in the circle and there's no single there, Obuya remains at the wrong end

Tait to Rakep, FOUR runs so Patel moved way outside the off stump to hit I don't know where, he eventually got an edge on the ball and placed it between himself, the stumps and past Haddin for four to fine leg
Tait to Rakep, no run he swings and misses. At least Obuya now has the strike
Johnson to C Obuya, no run Obuya swishes at one outside off stump and misses
Johnson to C Obuya, FOUR runs shot! The short ball from Johnson and Obuya swivels and pulls superbly along the ground to the deep backward square boundary! He's on 91
Johnson to C Obuya, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards deep point, takes the single
Johnson to Rakep, 1 run Patel nudges the ball off his pads through square leg
Johnson to C Obuya, no run length delivery outside off stump, Obuya slogs it to the man at midwicket
Johnson to C Obuya, FOUR runs he's found the gap at deep extra cover! Obuya stands his ground and smashes a full ball past the man at wide long off
Tait to Rakep, no run Patel defends towards the bowler, Obuya wanted one but it wasn't there
Tait to Rakep, no run Patel backs away towards leg and then can't make contact with a full ball outside off. what is he doing?!
Tait to Rakep, 1 run Patel steers to third man for a single

Tait to C Obuya, 1 run, OUT hit straight back down to long-on and Obuya runs back for the second. But the throw from the deep is good and Tait, even though he took an age to remove the bails, does it in the nick of time to run out Patel. Only one for Obuya, who has the strike th
Tait to C Obuya, no run short of a length outside off stump, Obuya swings and misses, and he's disappointed
Tait to C Obuya, 1 run no hundred for Obuya as Tait delivers a yorker which he digs out to point, a real shame but well played all the same

That's about it from us at ESPNcricinfo for today. Thank you for all your emails and comments. We get a lot and we try to read and publish as many as we can between deliveries. Join us tomorrow for another double header. Cheers, and goodnight.

So Australia win by 60 runs and extend their unbeaten streak in World cup matches to 33. But Kenya played proudly, they were good with the ball too, spirited performance and didn't let Australia get away easily. And their batsmen did not fold like they did in previous matches, Collins
Australia won by 60 runs
Player of the match is Collins Obuya, KENYA
